message.body: Happy Thanksgiving to you, too! When do you want to have breakfast tomorrow? Can we make it on the earlier side (like...10?) because I am planning to leave Needham between 1 and 2pm to visit Rob for the weekend.
Sure, 10 works for me :) want to let Charly and Neelima know?
I would but I'm running a little low on texting. Could you tell them? Thanks :)
So meeting at fresco's tomorrow at 10? Are we sure it's open?
Are things closed tomorrow too? I figured it would be open. Anyway there's no way to find out now. And yeah 10
Oh yeah, whoops, it probably is open. Keep forgetting what day it is. See you then!!!
